articles.title: Tearful Jose Mourinho celebrates his FIFTH European trophy after Roma win Europa Conference League - Daily Mail
articles.description: An emotional Jose Mourinho hailed his 'historic' achievement of becoming only the second manager to win five major European titles after Roma clinched the Europa Conference League.
articles.content: An emotional Jose Mourinho hailed his 'historic' achievement of becoming only the second manager to win five major European titles after Roma clinched the Europa Conference League on Wednesday night.… [+3442 chars]
